name: AssemblyScript
description:
Interface for AssemblyScript's compiler toolchain.

Features include:
- AssemblyScript compilation
- Dependency management
- JavaScript based imports allowing AssemblyScript to call back into JS & Lua.
- Inline JS function definitions inside AssemblyScript code.
- Load compiled AssemblyScript into a WebView.
- Call exported functions of a loaded AssemblyScript module.
- Save compiled AssemblyScript to disk.
- Load pre-compiled AssemblyScript from disk.

Note: Due to the nature of the JavaScript libraries involved this requires an internet connection while compiling AssemblyScript. Loading precompiled AssemblyScript does not though!
update_notes:
- Update AssemblyScript compiler backend to latest version (0.20.4)
- Using the new compiler, JS bindings are generated automatically to ease communication between JS & AssemblyScript.
- Support inline JS imports using @js_import & @js_end annotations in AssemblyScript code (example in 'Main' tab).
